Order of {{order.recognitionId}}
Add order
import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {CustomerServiceManager} from "../../service/customer-service-manager.service"; import {Meal} from "../../model/meal"; import {Order} from "../../model/order"; import {FormBuilder} from '@angular/forms'; declare var window: any; @Component({ selector: 'app-order', templateUrl: './order.component.html', styleUrls: ['./order.component.css'] }) export class OrderComponent implements OnInit { orders!: Order[]; addOrderModal: any; addOrderForm = this.formBuilder.group({ name: '', price: '' }); constructor(private customerServiceManager: CustomerServiceManager, private formBuilder: FormBuilder) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getOrders(); this.addOrderModal = document.getElementById('addOrderModal') } getOrders() { this.customerServiceManager.getOrders().subscribe(data => { this.orders = data; }) } onAddOrderFormSubmit(): void { this.addOrderForm.reset(); } openAddOrderModal() { this.addOrderModal.show(); } closeAddOrderModal() { this.addOrderModal.hide(); } }
